ComicInfo.Summary: Raging storms have closed down the roads around the institute. Kasey goes downstairs to restore the lights, but discovers several mutilated bodies and reports this to Doctor Wilson, the head of the institute. Concerned about the financial repercussions to the institute, Wilson tells Kasey not to reveal this to anyone else for fear of causing a panic among the patients. Later, after Lydia has disappeared, Britney and Christopher discover Annie in a room with the mutilated bodies of Brian and Louis.
ComicInfo.Tags: Kasey,Lydia Matthews,David Gonzales,Werewolves,South Dakota,Tanya Rosenburg,Louis Mayway,Brian Jacobs,Doctor Christopher Patrick,Doctor Wilson,Samantha Darren,The Big Bad Wolf,Annie Watson,Britney Waters
